name: Tam
feedback: This case is very protective and even has extra bulk on the corners to protect against a drop. The square around the camera comes out just enough to protect the camera but not be too bulky. Love the little bit of color. FIngerprints do show up but wipe off easily.

name: Maureen Kane
feedback: The case arrived quickly. It fit perfectly. It looks great. I have only had it a few weeks now. I haven't dropped it - yet. Hopefully, the case keeps the phone safe if I do.

name: Marcieness
feedback: I love how this feels. It‚Äôs plastic but sturdy. I love the colour to accent the side of my phone as I have the

name: Dana Cain
feedback: This is perfect. Almost like not having a case but with a sense that your phone is protected. I love it.

name: RdRydngHd
feedback: The new magnetic recharger resists sticking to the back of the phone because of the cover‚Äî not all the time, but some of the time. I have to triple-check, and that‚Äôs two times too many. I‚Äôm on the verge of ditching it, to be honest.

name: Tania D
feedback: It‚Äôs a nice case my only complaint is that I thought this phone case was going to be the hard clear plastic, this one is more flimsy than I hoped for. In the review pictures it looked like the sturdier material. It looks nice but I‚Äôm not sure about the durability yet.

name: A. Hopper
feedback: It‚Äôs a fairly stout case for the money. I chose one with a colored border to hide any debris that might get trapped between the sides of the case and phone. However, buyer be warned: the back (main clear part) is a bit tacky in texture (probably for grip), but that causes it to attract other things, especially fingerprints. I had to knock my review down 2 starts because it‚Äôs very much fingerprint magnet.

name: Ashli Nicole
feedback: I‚Äôve had this phone case for 2 months now and haven‚Äôt noticed any yellowing like I normally do with clear cases. I love the color it‚Äôs subtle enough to have my actual purple phone visible, definitely recommend!

name: Littlebit
feedback: I‚Äôd buy it again. Buy the screen saver separately!

name: LoveReading
feedback: The phone case is great. I have had the clear case over a year now and it started yellowing at about the 2 year mark. Not bad but would like a replacement as stated in the advertising. I contacted the seller for replacements. Hopefully they honor what is stated in their ad.

name: Karen
feedback: I bought this case as there was a lot of positive reviews and also based on the description that the case color won‚Äôt change to yellow. Also, the description mentioned that it is anti scratch and my case got scratched too! Very disappointed.

name: Okixfer
feedback: After 31/2 months yellow and turned a pink color. There is no way to contact seller. Hope they see this and honor warranty. Will update. Otherwise a nice sturdy case.

name: Oscar S
feedback: I have purchased many cases on Amazon and I have never had my cell phone break, ever! I had my previous case for as long as I‚Äôve had my phone and needed to replace it due to yellowing and bought this one, I only had it for about a month and my phone fell from my dresser and the whole back screen cracked. So disappointed and now I have to get my phone repaired.

name: Lisa
feedback: I have had my phone for two years and have had no problems even with multiple accidental drops. It was just old, scratched and yellowed so I purchased this one. Put the case on this morning, had my phone on my table this evening, it was knocked off 3-4ft and the entire back screen shattered!! I am now left with a broken phone I need to get fixed! Do not purchase! It does NOT work! Did not protect my phone as advertised!

name: Heidi Stehling
feedback: There is a major problem when the screen OFF button won‚Äôt depress properly‚Ä¶.then your battery wears down too fast. I can‚Äôt stand it when a phone case is supposed to be for a particular model phone but then it doesn‚Äôt fit the phone properly and you can‚Äôt actually press the button properly to make it function the way it‚Äôs supposed to.

name: Tony Li
feedback: Has been a month now and case is still somewhat clear. Decent case

name: Yeff
feedback: Fabricado con muy buen material buen gusto al tacto

name: Jean Claude Tadiomi
feedback: Nice

name: Amanda
feedback: Just ordered a second one after having the first for 2 years. It yellowed/was dirty so I replaced it. It survived many many drops.

name: Alexandra Tercero
feedback: I love it

name: J. C. L.
feedback: I replace s an old cover with this new one and it is a great fit and looks good too.

name: KHZ-242
feedback: I liked the fact that this product was not over sold. It is exactly as the description given states. I‚Äôm very pleased with the quality, the fit and look of my iPhone 12 case. Time will tell if it‚Äôs as durable & protective as claimed!

name: Letitia Strickland
feedback: great protection and ease of slipping in and out of a pocket that my previous rubberized protector proved a challenge

name: Sue
feedback: Haven‚Äôt had it long enough and haven‚Äôt dropped but it looks and feels just like a more expensive case I bought for last phone

name: Gruntled
feedback: I bought this for my wife to save money. Her iPhone is in very good condition but she is a somewhat abusive user and the originally installed screen protector and case showed a lot of wear and tear. In her mind, she felt she needed a new phone.
